description:
net/http: fix whitespace handling in sniffer.

A single character typo ("\n" instead of "\r") meant that
HTML data using DOS line breaks (CRLF) was not detected as HTML.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=3fc855915c48 ***

net/http: fix whitespace handling in sniffer.

A single character typo ("\n" instead of "\r") meant that
HTML data using DOS line breaks (CRLF) was not detected as HTML.

R=golang-dev, adg
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5365041

subject: code review 5365041: net/http: fix whitespace handling in sniffer.
